name: params
retry logic
Products
Netsis Stock json
func:
// Environment variable'dan branchCode deerini al
let stockCode = msg.payload.data[0].code

// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let query = `
    WITH A1 AS ( 
 SELECT
 ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY KOD ORDER BY INCKEYNO ASC )+3 SIRA,
 OLCUBIRIMI, KOD  
 FROM TBLSTBIRIM  WHERE KOD='${stockCode}'
 )
 
 SELECT 
    A.STOK_KODU,
    A.BARKOD,
    CASE 
        WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 1 THEN B.OLCU_BR1 
        WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 2 THEN B.OLCU_BR2
        WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 3 THEN B.OLCU_BR3
		WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 4 THEN A1.OLCUBIRIMI
		WHEN I_YEDEK1 = 5 THEN A1.OLCUBIRIMI		
        ELSE NULL
    END AS OLCU_BIRIMI
FROM 
    TBLSTOKBAR A
LEFT JOIN 
    TBLSTSABIT B ON A.STOK_KODU = B.STOK_KODU
 LEFT JOIN A1 ON A1.KOD=B.STOK_KODU AND I_YEDEK1=A1.SIRA
WHERE 
    A.STOK_KODU = '${stockCode}';

`;

// msg.payload'a sorguyu ekle
msg.query = query;

return msg;

name: function 41
Netsis Stock json
func:
// Environment variable'dan branchCode deerini al
let branchCode = env.get("BranchCode");
msg.sforinStockCode = msg.sforinStockCode||[]

// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let query = `
    SELECT A.STOK_KODU,
       dbo.TRK(STOK_ADI) AS STOK_ADI,
       dbo.TRK(KOD_2) AS GRUP_KODU,
       dbo.TRK(KOD_3) AS ALT_GRUP_KODU,
       OLCU_BR1,
       OLCU_BR2,
       OLCU_BR3,
       PAY_1,
       PAYDA_1,
       PAY2,
       PAYDA2,	  
       CASE 
           WHEN BARKOD1 IS NOT NULL AND BARKOD1 <> '' THEN BARKOD1
           WHEN OLCU_BR1 IS NOT NULL AND OLCU_BR1 <> '' THEN CONCAT(A.STOK_KODU, OLCU_BR1)
           ELSE NULL
       END AS BARKOD1,
       CASE 
           WHEN BARKOD2 IS NOT NULL AND BARKOD2 <> '' THEN BARKOD2
           WHEN OLCU_BR2 IS NOT NULL AND OLCU_BR2 <> '' THEN CONCAT(A.STOK_KODU, OLCU_BR2)
           ELSE NULL
       END AS BARKOD2,
       CASE 
           WHEN BARKOD3 IS NOT NULL AND BARKOD3 <> '' THEN BARKOD3
           WHEN OLCU_BR3 IS NOT NULL AND OLCU_BR3 <> '' THEN CONCAT(A.STOK_KODU, OLCU_BR3)
           ELSE NULL
       END AS BARKOD3,
       B.TUR
FROM TBLSTSABIT A
LEFT JOIN TBLSTSABITEK B ON A.STOK_KODU = B.STOK_KODU
    WHERE SUBE_KODU IN ('-1', '${branchCode}')  AND A.KOD_3 IS NOT NULL  AND    DBO.TRK(A.KOD_2) IN ('MAMUL','YARIMML','HAMMADDE','AMBALAJ','DER')     
`;

// msg.payload'a sorguyu ekle
msg.query=query;

return msg;

function 44
Netsis Customer json
func:
// Environment variable'dan branchCode deerini al
let branchCode = env.get("BranchCode");
msg.getAllSforinCustomer = msg.getAllSforinCustomer || []
// Create the query dynamically
let query = `
   SELECT  
    CS.CARI_KOD,
    dbo.TRK(CARI_ISIM) AS CARI_ISIM,
    dbo.TRK(CARI_ADRES) AS CARI_ADRES,
    dbo.TRK(CARI_IL) AS CARI_IL,
    dbo.TRK(CARI_ILCE) AS CARI_ILCE,
    dbo.TRK(ULKE_KODU) AS ULKE_KODU,
    CARI_TIP,
    COALESCE(VERGI_NUMARASI, CSEK.TCKIMLIKNO) AS VKN_TC,
    dbo.TRK(VERGI_DAIRESI) AS VERGI_DAIRESI,
    ISNULL(CS.KAYITTARIHI, FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyyy.MM.dd')) AS KAYITTARIHI,
    CS.CARI_TEL,
    CASE CS.CARI_TIP
        WHEN 'S' THEN 'VENDOR'
        WHEN 'A' THEN 'CUSTOMER'
    END AS CARI_TIPI
FROM 
    TBLCASABIT CS
LEFT JOIN 
    TBLCASABITEK CSEK ON CSEK.CARI_KOD = CS.CARI_KOD
WHERE  
    CS.CARI_TIP IN ('S', 'A')  
    AND ISNULL(CS.C_YEDEK1, 'A') = 'A'
	AND CS.SUBE_KODU  IN ('-1', '${branchCode}')       
`;

// msg.payload'a sorguyu ekle
msg.query=query;

return msg;

function 46
Set Cron
params
retry logic
BuyerAndSellerOrder
function 47
BuyerAndSellerOrder
func:
// Environment variable'dan branchCode deerini al
let branchCode = env.get("BranchCode");

// Sorguyu dinamik olarak olutur
let query = `
 WITH STBIRIM AS
  (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY KOD
                            ORDER BY INCKEYNO ASC)+3 SIRA,
                       KOD,
                       OLCUBIRIMI,
                       PAY,
                       PAYDA
   FROM TBLSTBIRIM)
SELECT FISNO AS docNum,
       DB_NAME() AS company,
       CASE SPMAS.FTIRSIP
           WHEN 6 THEN 'MS'
           WHEN 7 THEN 'SS'
       END documantTypeCode,
       SPMAS.TARIH createdOn,
       SPMAS.SIPARIS_TEST deliveryDate,
       SPTRA.SIRA itemNo,
       dbo.TRK(SPTRA.STOK_KODU) productCode, --SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT AS quantity ,
 CASE ISNULL(SPTRA.OLCUBR,1)
     WHEN 1 THEN SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT
     ELSE (STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT)*CEVRIM
 END AS quantity,
 CASE ISNULL(SPTRA.OLCUBR,1)
     WHEN 1 THEN ST.OLCU_BR1
     WHEN 2 THEN ST.OLCU_BR2
     WHEN 3 THEN ST.OLCU_BR3
     WHEN 4 THEN BRM.OLCUBIRIMI
     WHEN 5 THEN BRM.OLCUBIRIMI
 END AS unit,
  SPMAS.CARI_KODU AS CUSTOMERCODE,
    SPTRA.DEPO_KODU as GetWarehouseLocation,
    SPTRA.DEPO_KODU as GetWarehouseLocation,
    CASE SPTRA.EKALAN_NEDEN WHEN 1 THEN dbo.TRK(EKALAN)
   ELSE dbo.TRK(ST.STOK_ADI) END  AS DefinitionLang
FROM TBLSIPAMAS SPMAS
LEFT JOIN TBLSIPATRA SPTRA ON SPMAS.FATIRS_NO = SPTRA.FISNO
LEFT JOIN TBLSTSABIT ST ON ST.STOK_KODU=SPTRA.STOK_KODU
LEFT JOIN STBIRIM BRM ON BRM.KOD=SPTRA.STOK_KODU
AND ISNULL(SPTRA.OLCUBR,1)=BRM.SIRA
WHERE SPMAS.KAPATILMIS <>'K'
  AND SPTRA.STHAR_GCMIK-FIRMA_DOVTUT<>0
  AND SPTRA.STHAR_HTUR<>'K'
  AND SPMAS.SUBE_KODU IN  ('-1', '${branchCode}')     
`;

 
msg.query=query;

return msg;
